channel.title: Help
channel.description: Ok how do I add the auto retaliate button to the client and how do I add to server on a deltascape base to make it work can't find anywhere

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Your going to want to add the interface into your cache. Then adding a code into your server clicking class so when you click the auto-retaliate button it takes effect. You also have to edit the auto-retaliate method in the client class. Auto-retaliate is already set to on, on most delta based servers.

Read full topic
